thread.title: Drake bags two Grammys for ‘Hotline Bling’ | Globalnews.ca
thread.title_full: Drake bags two Grammys for ‘Hotline Bling’ | Globalnews.ca

author: David Friend
title: Drake bags two Grammys for ‘Hotline Bling’ | Globalnews.ca
text:
February 12, 2017 6:46 pm Drake bags two Grammys for ‘Hotline Bling’ By David Friend The Associated Press 
Drake performs onstage in Toronto in an Oct. 8, 2016 file photo. THE CANADIAN PRESS/AP, Arthur Mola, Invision What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - Listen 
Drake has two more Grammys on his shelf thanks to “Hotline Bling.” 
The Toronto-raised performer’s megahit won best rap song and best rap or sung performance in a pre-telecast ceremony for music’s biggest night. 
It brings his career Grammy tally to three statues, after winning for his 2011 album “Take Care.” 
But Drake wasn’t in Los Angeles to accept the honour. 
He’s in the midst of a European tour. 
The Grammys main event airs on City and CBS starting at 8 p.m. ET. © 2017 The Canadian Press
